original_title: a love letter to Brian, Lesley, and Michelle
overview: a love letter to Brian, Lesley, and Michelle is the result of human beings coming together, diverse in age, sexuality, race, and gender, talking with their bodies, minds, and souls, about Black lives. An interactive and experimental commentary that leaves the viewers looking inward, seeking justice from within. This is a film, a play, an experience, a concert dance, a work of art, a self-reflection, a protest.
title: a love letter to Brian, Lesley, and Michelle
